name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Full Stack Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience delivering high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **C#**, **.NET**, **React**, and **SQL Server**, with expertise in building and integrating **APIs**. Experienced in developing both frontend and backend solutions, leveraging technologies like **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Skilled in applying **Azure** for cloud-native deployments and implementing robust **CI/CD** pipelines to enhance continuous integration and delivery processes.

Demonstrated ability to work in Agile environments, fostering strong **team collaboration** and **mentorship** among colleagues. Adept at **unit testing** and problem-solving, ensuring high-quality and compliant code. Strong communicator committed to aligning development with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS while driving innovative solutions.
